result.execSummary:
The defendant Lawrence Eben Bildeau was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lawrence Eben Bildeau is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Lawrence Eben Bildeau was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia (Forfeiture) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: All costs, fees, and other surcharges have been paid in full from the bond funds posted in this matter.

records.addlTxt:
1:49 PM Defendant Lawrence Eben Bildeau in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Lawrence Eben Bildeau.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for State of Wisconsin. Case is on for Plea/Sentencing Hearing.  Agreement is recited by Attorney Otten- def pleading to ordinance violation (amended Count 3) for court costs.  
State moves to amend Count 3 to ordinance; Court grants.  Def pleads G to amended ct 3.  Court finds def guilty, assesses, $200 (to be taken from cash bond posted).

ADDRESS INFO for Lawrence Eben Bildeau
Current: 632 Grand Ave, Superior, WI 54880 United States  (Effective: 09-15-2022)
Prior: 420 27th 1/2 Ave, Cumberland, WI 54829 United States

10:01 AM Defendant Lawrence Eben Bildeau in court.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Lawrence Eben Bildeau.  Attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for State of Wisconsin. Case on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: resolution very likely, defense gathering references to support resolution to DA.  Court asks for basis of agreement; State provides basis.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 26, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

The defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety. Subject to random testing of breath, blood or urine by any law enforcement or corrections officer upon arrest or reasonable suspicion. No contact with "BB", "SB", "ST", or "DR".  Defendant must go to Ruth House and comply with their program and maintain his sobriety.

11:49 AM Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lawrence Eben Bildeau in court, in custody.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Lawrence Eben Bildeau.  Case set for prelim- def indicates it will waive prelim.  Atty Otten notes there is an agreement to dismiss Count 1.  State moves to dismiss Count 1; granted.  Court grants right to continue with the motion as it relates to the other counts; Court denies the motion, but def may file additional motion at a later date.  Case on for Waiver of Preliminary Hearing:  Court informs def of rights to PH; waived by def.  Court finds waiver of right to PH knowingly, freely, voluntarily made.  Court finds factual basis for bind over.  State files information that does not mirror complaint- Cts 1 is not included.  Atty Otten preserves on motions until next status.  Case proceeds to Arraignment.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, def. waives reading.  Court informs def. of charges, possible penalties and rights.  NG plea entered to all counts.  Def updates address.  Atty Otten argues for bond modification to reduce to $200 cash.  State responds, not objecting to modification to $200 cash.
Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Lawrence Eben Bildeau
Current: 420 27th 1/2 Ave, Cumberland, WI 54829 United States  (Effective: 07-06-2022)
Prior: 320 - 9th Ave S, South St Paul, MN 55075

2:01 PM Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lawrence Eben Bildeau appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alysja Otten in court for Lawrence Eben Bildeau.  Case on for an Initial Appearance.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights.  Time limits not waived to prelim.  Atty Otten requests to be heard on bond at the preliminary hearing, court will hear the argument at that time if Atty Otten wishes.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 20, 2022 at 11:30 am.
